## RemirrorManagerProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RemirrorManagerProps
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [extensions](./react.remirrormanagerprops.extensions.md) | <code>Array&lt;FlexibleExtension&lt;AnyExtension&gt;&gt;</code> | Inject custom extensions into the Remirror manager.<!-- -->Each extension must be in the form of a prioritized extension which determines the order in which it'll be loaded.<!-- -->By default these are placed after the JSX <code>RemirrorExtension</code>'s. |
|  [useBaseExtensions](./react.remirrormanagerprops.usebaseextensions.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether to use base extensions |
